result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Benjamin A. Loy

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 2:33pm
INCLUDES 15CM1346, 15CM2376, and 15TR1635 
State appears by ADA Lisa Gramer. Deft appears in person with Atty Peter Rotter
  
State says today was set for JT in 15CM1346, however will proceed to plea and wishes to dismiss and read in new file 15CM2376
Atty Rotter makes initial appearance in 15CM2376 
Information filed 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY on Ct. 1

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
15CM1346:
Ct. 1 DC-Repeater to delete "repeater" enhancer
15CM2376:
Ct. 1 BJ-Misdemeanor >> D&RI
15TR1635:
Ct. 1 Speeding on service road (11-15 mph) >> Dismissed
COURT grants above

PLEA: 
15CM1346: Ct. 1 DC >> NO CONTEST
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: w/hold sentencing. 1 year probation. CONDITIONS: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Maintain GFE in full time employmen/schooling/combination of the two. Perform  20 hrs of cc. Pay CC. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. If revoked may be 3 days credit in 15CM2376. However, zero days credit given.

Adj: 2:46pm
